features: NEW: Confirmed Orders Count - Dashboard statistics now show confirmed orders
NEW: Reminders Tab - Smart follow-up system for enquiries in 'In Talks' status
NEW: WhatsApp Reminders - Send emotional reminder messages with event countdown
NEW: Reminder Tracking - Track reminder count displayed as chip
NEW: Smart Filtering - Shows enquiries needing reminders (created >15 days OR event <21 days)
NEW: Auto Status Updates - Past events automatically marked as 'not_interested' or 'completed'
IMPROVED: Notification System - All active admin users now receive notifications
IMPROVED: In Talks Tab - Past events automatically filtered out
IMPROVED: Reminders Tab - Now sorted by event date (latest first) for better prioritization
IMPROVED: In Talks Tab - Now sorted by created date (newest first)
IMPROVED: Simplified reminder messages - cleaner, more professional format
IMPROVED: Better message formatting with clear line breaks
IMPROVED: Explicit brand mention and tagline in reminder messages
Fixed admin notifications for enquiry updates - improved logging and error handling when assigned users make changes
Fixed reminder condition - past events now properly excluded from reminders tab
Fixed change history - status changes and all field updates now properly tracked
Fixed push notifications - Cloud Functions send FCM notifications when notifications are created
Improved contact saving - added timeouts and error handling for OnePlus and custom Android skins
Enhanced audit logging - individual field changes tracked when editing enquiries
Better error handling - graceful fallbacks prevent crashes on problematic devices
Fixed image uploads - Firebase Storage properly configured with correct bucket and CORS
Image persistence - reference images now properly saved and visible to all users
bugFixes: CRITICAL: Fixed notification system - All admin users now receive notifications (was only finding 1 admin)
Fixed admin user query - Defaults isActive to true when field is missing (backward compatible)
Fixed In Talks tab showing past events - Now filters out past events automatically
Fixed Reminders tab sorting - Changed to latest event date first (reversed order) for better visibility of upcoming events
Fixed In Talks tab sorting - Changed to newest first (by created date) for better visibility of recent enquiries
Fixed admin notifications missing for status changes - improved admin user query and added comprehensive logging
Fixed change history not showing status changes - now stores status values instead of labels
Fixed contact saving crashes on OnePlus phones - added comprehensive error handling and timeouts
Fixed push notifications not working - added Cloud Functions to send FCM notifications
Fixed audit logging missing for enquiry edits - now tracks all individual field changes
Fixed repository status updates not recording audit logs - added audit trail support
Fixed image upload CORS errors - configured Firebase Storage CORS for web uploads
Fixed image storage - images field now properly updated when editing enquiries
Fixed Firebase Storage bucket configuration - using correct bucket name for web
